pkgmetadata.longdescription: # ncbi_dbCollection of commands to query or process NCBI data## Installationconda install -c mmariotti ncbi_db## ToolsThese tools are available:- *ncbi_assembly* search and download assemblies/genomes for any species/lineage, or its annotation/proteome- *ncbi_sequences* search and download nucleotide/protein sequences or their metadata- *ncbi_pubmed* search and format ncbi pubmed entries- *ncbi_taxonomy* search ncbi taxonomy for species or lineages- *ncbi_taxonomy_tree* obtain a tree from ncbi taxonomy for a set of input species- *ncbi_search* generic search tool for any ncbi DB- *parse_genbank* parse a genbank flat file; requires installation of GBParsyRun any tool with option -h to display its usage.Most tools require internet, as they connect online to ncbi.
